Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Division
ShortDescription:
Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/
Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/
Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Austin
